channel.title: Finance on The Wisniowski Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Finance on The Wisniowski Blog

item.title: Australia Entry #3 - The Finances of Moving
item.description: When I was moving out of my apartment in Wisconsin, I realized how helpful and important it was to look back at the prices that I purchased things and to help wrap my head around how much money it will take to move to a new apartment and furnish it all from the beginning.
